events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and the resume looks promising with relevant experience.
The candidate's profile has been categorised under Engineering due to their software development background and listed skills.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to manage the communication and interview scheduling for this candidate.
The initial screening call was successfully conducted, where the candidate demonstrated good understanding of software development fundamentals.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm about progressing to the next step in the technical interview process.
The technical interview with the engineering team has been scheduled for next Wednesday as per the candidateâ€™s availability.
